body:
Ufff... I know that in the end we will hate the second part... since in the end the damned father tells him that about the other girl but in the end he will fuck both of them... I don't know what logic the author will give him so that There it ended like this, but honestly I feel disappointed.
This comes from an image I saw just today on the author's patreon.
Good story, but still need improvment in drawing...... I hope, next will be improved....
So the father fucked the girl, so the girl won't forget the son... Genius move.

Dad did what any single man would do if they get the chance to bang that, the kid could had his own gf when he was living in other place, she was just a childhood friend but now suddenly when he knows his old friend got hot he feels like she belonged to him lol

356516, Twin mother. Another similar like this one. Though the son is a pathetic cock. Him a high schooler got cocked by middle/elem schooler and didn't do shit. It was going on for a couple of years until he finally found out. He was always drugged to sleep by his own aunt. The aunt was in it too. The second part about to be released.

Scumbag bastard of a father, he knew that were meant for each other but still went after her. And the girl accepted 😑. I'm glad the son fucking punched him but he still didn't storm into in the bedroom. Beat him up and slap her.

Wow, you gotta read it from left to right. Discovered that on pg 17, 🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️🤷‍♂️💀. The dad must've been fucking that girl since when she was probably a loli. The girl is one of them whores, the little sis was in on it too. She probably wasn't banged yet but definately knew that they were having sex and didn't tell anyone to stop them.
@Mecanicus dude its korean army doubt he would change much or get gf in army.

Since this is all before the son goes to the military ... there are 2 options.
1.- sequel shows other girls also fucking someone else
2.- sequel comes with the kid coming back from the military with a gf or violent.
I want the second version more id like an ntr to the previous ntr ... so few of those.
discount terasu mc kek
Korean author...
Just get a new girl and leave home. Why so dramatic if she was a whore in the first place. Rather you should be disgusted being friends with a slut like that.
What happened to the other girl?
art was good but the translation... you can tell whoever translated this english is not their 1st language. also, this isnt NTR the mc hasn't even thought of the girl until he saw her years later
The younger sister is giving the vibes of another doujin that came out last month were the MC crush is having sex and the younger sister taunts him and gets fucked by MC
Ehm wtf so exactly when did the dad make a move on her? When she was like 8? 10? 12? Seeing as he's talking about how she was the only one to comfort him back then......
This was cool, hopefully we get a part2.

I can definitely say it’s not NTR but still that’s fucked up I would have continued to beat the dad until he is unconscious but if I stopped and came back from military oh boy I would end my dad but when sora is not in the house and I will kill that guy and bury him and I will fuck those two girls into only wanting my D
Sadly artist have not posted new part in last 2months..

Story piqued my interest in an unusual way and, even though the art seems amateurish, it's got the story going. I hope the artist continues with this series, I like them showing dedication with their work and not just halfway quit.

@Keepitquiet Normal really, "sometimes" when we read,watch etc we don't read it/understand it in perspective of the char. but as a reader/viewer/watcher biggest example is getting mad over char. for not realizing something etc , it also applies IRL when we don't know how to read the mood/atmosphere say something dumb, not understanding the pain of the person who is suffering  and just say man it up whatever, but anyways yeeahhh im bored.
You people have weird fucking definitions of ntr. This story is focused on the suffering of the MC. It's ntr. It's really not going to do anything for you if you don't like that.

@Stck Well its generally confusing because many of us view it in our own perspective not through the main char. that's why sometimes its confusing, but yes in the eyes of the Son his father NTR him, and i take back what i said on the other girl you might be right she got picked up by pick up artist or something, though then again i still don't see this as a NTR cause i consider NTR to be more hardcore not some one sided feeling of betrayal,cheating whatever.

Jfc people like you who go "nOT NtR!" Are just tiresome. Go learn the actual word roots of the term netorare and talk to someone who speaks the language before you start deciding what it means, it is NOT just a straight word for cheating, a relationship is not required for ntr. It means a general concept of Stolen Love, a father who drags his son away from a girl then fucks that same girl into submission is absolutely an Ntr story -- plus the girl he left drunk in the rain definitely got taken and Ntred by someone while the boy was gone, we'll most likely see that in a sequel.

NTR cause the guy getting cucked was present, but not NTR nor even cheating, voyeurism yes, this is like finding your crush from long time ago you still have feelings for is not a virgin anymore and you throw hissy fit like bruh, @Destroyer Well given that text message on the phone chances are high she was already fucking with someone else and im betting its the father after why would he stop only for 1.
i bet the other girl is fucking another man too
Definitely not ntr
he got skill issue :/

How is this even NTR? The MC barely even knew the girl, was never in a relationship with her and hadn't seen her since he was a kid. He just seems like a jerk and possibily mildly retarded. The dad literally did nothing wrong.
lol the person down below, what do you think is the main theme of this type of H?

I just hope that Mc will not get cucked by another girl too.
